weather_report:
On the cool morning of February 24th, 2025 in Subiaco, the universe has draped a translucent veil of clear skies overhead. A cloak of a gentle chill, a mere murmur of the season, gently brushes against the skin, inviting you to embrace the day in the lightest woolen layers as comfort. The rising sun, slowly ascending from the sheath of horizon, is set to bask the town in a luminous robe of amber light, adorned with the promise of enigmatic shadows. 

As time rolls by, the sun shall mark its zenith one would expect a day rich in clarity, a day as transparent as a freshly polished looking glass, unabridged and untarnished. The dome of the sky will be a picture of serenity, a silent symphony of milky blues interspersed with tender wisps of pristine white. A day so pleasant, that it beckons you to take a stroll in your favorite park or plunge your hands into the soil of your garden, acquainting yourself with the cool dampness beneath. The UV index unknown, let us not forget our sun brimmed hats or our favorite sunglasses to gently dim that kingly glare.
